## Make some vectors

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

# Check class
class(marmots)
```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)
class(pika)

# Scalar multiplier

scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika

scalar_pika
```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)
apples <- c(6, 7, 8)

apples + bananas

bananas - apples

# Dot product in R - %*%

bananas %*% apples

```
